title: Need Help
body: I used to have an account on this game that I hit level 18 or so on. I know the username, but apparently not the password. However, the email I used for this particular account I no longer have access to. Long story short, it was a yahoo account and yahoo is a shitty company. Anyways, I'm wondering if there is anyway I can receive assistance with this. I'd rather not have to level up over again through this account

replies.body: Since you no longer have access to the initial email, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  With some verification, our account team can update your info and get your account back.  Hang tight until we reply back!
